competition_summary.context: Competition Our products serve teams of all shapes and sizes in every industry, from software and technical teams to IT and service teams, to a broad array of business teams. Our competitors range from large technology vendors to new and emerging businesses in each of the markets we serve: • Software Teams - Our competitors include large technology vendors, including Microsoft (including GitHub) and IBM, and smaller companies like Gitlab that offer project management, collaboration and developer
